name: The Catacombs (Khunkurisu)
description:
A simple game made for Scream Jam 2020.  This was my first Game Jam, and I made this solo.  

====Assets Used====
Yughues Free Pavement Materials - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/roads/yughues-free-p...
Yughues Free Ground Materials - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/floors/yughues-free-...
Yughues Free Bark Materials - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/textures-materials/nature/yughues-free-...
GlowMachine Sound Design Real Footsteps - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/real-footsteps-91171

All other assets (mostly sound effects) and code in the game were made by yours truly.
